name: Adobe Character Animator Project
summary: Learn about .CHPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Character Animator is included with Adobe Creative Cloud and allows you to animate characters based on your movements and templates packaged with the software. You can also import designs from Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator.

When you save an animation project with Character Animator, the application creates a CHPROJ file to store the contents. You can then close the project, re-open it, and continue editing the project at a later time. To create a CHPROJ file in Adobe Character Animator, select File → New Project..., modify the project, then select File → Save Project or Save Project As....

description: A CHPROJ file contains an animation project created by Adobe Character Animator, a program used to create 2D animations of illustrated characters. It stores information about a project which includes one or more scenes and any characters (known as "puppets"), graphics, sound effects, music, and voiceovers imported into the project. CHPROJ files do not contain actual media, only references to the locations of media files imported into the project.

instructions: You can open a CHPROJ file with Adobe Character Animator. To open a CHPROJ file, select File → Open Project... or double-click the icon of the CHPROJ file if you have installed Character Animator on your computer.
Character Animator can convert CHPROJ files to several file types, including the following formats:
To export a CHPROJ file with Character Animator, select File → Export and choose the format to which you would like to export the project.
